thread.section_title: HUNTERcourse.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HUNTERcourse.com | huntercourse.com
thread.title: Carol Beauregard

author: Carol Beauregard
title: Carol Beauregard
text: I appreciated the information on safety, types of hunting equipment and the repetition of hunting & safety rules. I gained knowledge of types of wildlife I did not know existed in Saskatchewan. I have learned respect for other hunters, landowners and regulations involved with hunting, I am excited to practice in the field and greatly appreciated being able to practice the shoot using the software from this course. The Huntercourse.com made me aware of the whole picture of hunting and shooting and has advanced my skills and abilities.
